{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=PR2000 |asin=B00HQ883T4 |fcc_date=09/27/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |availability=common |type=travel router, range extender |fcc_id=PY313200234 |ic_id=4054A-13200234 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.3 |pwr_conn=C7 |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620N;MT7620N, 1319-BSML, CTPPU704; |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68B16CWQD-25H |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620N;MT7620N, 1319-BSML, CTPPU704; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }} {{TagLine|N300 Trek Travel Router/Range Extender}} :{{ProductPage|http://netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-range-extenders/PR2000.aspx}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=PR2000}} This device can alternately be powered by the microUSB port on the unit.
